name: Translate
prompt:
Please translate the content in {{path}} to {{language}}.

Requirements:
- Maintain the original meaning and tone
- Preserve formatting (markdown, code blocks, etc.)
- Keep technical terms consistent
- Adapt idioms appropriately for the target language
- Preserve any code snippets unchanged

Save the translated content to:
- `{artifactDir}/{{language}}.md` (or a language-suffixed filename under `{artifactDir}`).

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to the file to translate

routing.useWhen: Use when user asks for language localization of user-visible content.
routing.dontUseWhen: Don't use for translating source code identifiers or binary formats.
routing.successCriteria: Preserves meaning and structure with style-appropriate phrasing.
